code:
flowchart TD
    RD[Racing Dynamics] -->|"compresses timelines"| CC[Corner-Cutting]
    CC -->|"inadequate testing"| MO[Mesa-Optimization]
    MO -->|"misaligned optimizer"| DA[Deceptive Alignment]
    DA -->|"hides misalignment"| SC[Scheming]
    SC -->|"resists correction"| CF[Corrigibility Failure]
    CF -->|"loss of control"| CAT[Catastrophic Outcome]

    style RD fill:#ff9999
    style CAT fill:#ff0000

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我同意这个观点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: Corner-Cutting、Mesa-Optimization和另一个方案相比，优势在于...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A

dialogue.utterance: 这个系统主要由Deceptive Alignment组成。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，Deceptive Alignment的作用是...

dialogue.utterance: 我同意这个观点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 整体架构包含Catastrophic Outcome、"inadequate testing"这几个部分。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
